snippet: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady on Friday said he would end his legal battle against the National Football League over the decision to suspend him for four games as a result of the "Deflategate" scandal....
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady on Friday said he would end his legal battle against the National Football League over the decision to suspend him for four games as a result of the "Deflategate" scandal.

headline.main: Patriots Quarterback Brady Ends 'Deflategate' Legal Fight
headline.print_headline: Patriots Quarterback Brady Ends 'Deflategate' Legal Fight
